title: Technically speaking - career futures for women
brief_description: Shows girls working in technical occupations. Indicates the range of jobs available, the prerequisites, work conditions, and attitudes by employers and fellow workers to girls in these jobs. Also shows how parents and teachers have discouraged girls from taking up these occupations.
